messages.msgSnippet: i take my kids out and put them on my lap occasionally too...glad to know i m not alone audrey ...
messages.messageBody:
i take my kids out and put them on my lap occasionally too...glad to know
i'm not alone
audrey

> > 500
> > hours strapped in carseats.
>
>Speaking of car seats........Those darn things take up too much room....
>We have 7 kids and uh....you all know where I am going with that one.
>We have a van, but I don't see anyone handing me a a 9 & up passenger van
>because they are complaining that I have a seat on the floor between 2
>captain chairs.
>Anyhow, besides that Teyha are darling 1 year on will sit in a car seat for
>5-10 minutes and ALL HELL will break loose!!!!
>I will not let her cry (we are talking lake swelled tears here),hollar, &
>scream for 5-20 minutes until I get where I am going so one of the older
>ones
>will get her and put her in their laps and seat belt the both of them and
>she
>is content as a peach.....
>She hates being restrained and will raise ____ to the highest!!!!!! She has
>to be free and she will fight tooth and nail to be free....
>When it ain't right, you will hear about it......
>The things is....she just turned 1 a month ago.
>
>Kim

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 2190
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/4/2002 11:56:39 PM Central Daylight Time, ... Speaking of car seats........Those darn things take up too much room.... We have 7 kids and
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/4/2002 11:56:39 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> He says, for example, that in 1960 2 yo's spent about 200 hours in
> a car (not in a car seat, either). In a recent year - (1999?) they spent
> 500
> hours strapped in carseats.

Speaking of car seats........Those darn things take up too much room....
We have 7 kids and uh....you all know where I am going with that one.
We have a van, but I don't see anyone handing me a a 9 & up passenger van
because they are complaining that I have a seat on the floor between 2
captain chairs.
Anyhow, besides that Teyha are darling 1 year on will sit in a car seat for
5-10 minutes and ALL HELL will break loose!!!!
I will not let her cry (we are talking lake swelled tears here),hollar, &
scream for 5-20 minutes until I get where I am going so one of the older ones
will get her and put her in their laps and seat belt the both of them and she
is content as a peach.....
She hates being restrained and will raise ____ to the highest!!!!!! She has
to be free and she will fight tooth and nail to be free....
When it ain't right, you will hear about it......
The things is....she just turned 1 a month ago.

Kim


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
